t:
“After the apocalypse it's been
     such a long time since I saw
               another human,”
said the doctor as he put his stethoscope on my chest.



“Yeah, same here,” I said, as I saw the terror in his eyes from the lack of my heartbeats.
c:
I just wanted a friend.



#apocalypse #zombie #undead #doctor #human #loneliness #heartbeat
Because, why not? #spookiansclub
